author: acolytec3
content: I will try and get the CI working and then it should be ready to merge. I'm not touching the style at all and just added build scripts to copy any markdown to the Gatsby build and then update the config to adjust the links on the sidebar. I also much prefer the docusaurus visuals but didn't want to invest energy in that on this PR

author: boma_naps
content: Thanks for the update! Really appreciate you getting the CI sorted and all the work you’ve done so far ❤️. Once this PR lands, I’m happy to help port over any useful changes from the previous Docusaurus work, like the namespace tweaks and potential UI improvements. Let me know if there’s anything I can help test or review in the meantime!
